quote: I'm not interested in a part-time agent.
why_clipworthy: This moment captures the pivotal decision that led Jerry to commit fully to real estate, highlighting the importance of dedication.
suggested_hook: Why being a part-time agent might be holding you back.

quote: There's always somebody buying something. There's always somebody selling something.
why_clipworthy: This quote challenges the scarcity mindset and encourages agents to find opportunities in any market condition.
suggested_hook: How to thrive in any real estate market.
